HegemonPack:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.

If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

HegemonPack:MouthEssence.NAME: Mouth Essence
HegemonPack:MouthEssence.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! tisCardPack:Taunt. Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

HegemonPack:SympathyStrike.NAME: Sympathy Strike
HegemonPack:SympathyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If played by a class other than a Hegemon, gain !M! HegemonMod:Toxicity.

HegemonPack:Moralise.NAME: Moralise
HegemonPack:Moralise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply Weak to ALL. NL For each that resists it, give them 2 strength and you 1.

HegemonPack:Untether.NAME: Untether
HegemonPack:Untether.DESCRIPTION: Deal target ally !D! damage, increase their base draw by 1 and apply 3 tisCardPack:Insanity

HegemonPack:Avenger.NAME: Avenger
HegemonPack:Avenger.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever an ally consumes Artifact, create a *Punish.
HegemonPack:Avenger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever an ally consumes Artifact, create a *Punish.

HegemonPack:KindofHisThing.NAME: Kind of His Thing
HegemonPack:KindofHisThing.DESCRIPTION: ALL players gain buffs over time. NL It's kind of your "Thing".
HegemonPack:KindofHisThing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL players gain buffs and lose !M! hp to draw !M! each turn. NL It's kind of your "Thing".

HegemonPack:KindofYourThing.NAME: Kind of Your Thing
HegemonPack:KindofYourThing.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! health.

HegemonPack:ParentsRunaSchool.NAME: ..and Drink!
HegemonPack:ParentsRunaSchool.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Insight into ALL draw piles.

HegemonPack:WayoftheReaper.NAME: Way of the Reaper
HegemonPack:WayoftheReaper.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Punish to ALL allies hands.
HegemonPack:WayoftheReaper.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Punish to ALL allies hands and !M! in yours.

HegemonPack:Plague.NAME: Plague
HegemonPack:Plague.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Vector to ALL allies draw piles.
HegemonPack:Plague.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Vector+ to ALL allies draw piles.

HegemonPack:Sandwiches.NAME: Sandwiches
HegemonPack:Sandwiches.DESCRIPTION: Heal ALL players by !M!. NL Exhaust.

HegemonPack:SilverLiquor.NAME: Silver Liquor
HegemonPack:SilverLiquor.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies gain weak and !M! HegemonMod:Toxicity. NL Exhaust.
HegemonPack:SilverLiquor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL allies gain weak and !M! HegemonMod:Toxicity.

HegemonPack:SpiritCoins.NAME: Spirit Coins
HegemonPack:SpiritCoins.DESCRIPTION: Give ALL allies !B!x3 Block and !HegemonPack:Leech! HegemonMod:Leech_Toxin.
HegemonPack:SpiritCoins.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Give ALL allies !B!x3 Block and !HegemonPack:Leech! HegemonMod:Leech_Toxin.

HegemonPack:UtterContempt.NAME: Utter Contempt
HegemonPack:UtterContempt.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! HegemonMod:Sin. NL This enemy's HegemonMod:Sin applies to their Poison.
HegemonPack:UtterContempt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! HegemonMod:Sin. NL This enemy's HegemonMod:Sin applies to their Poison.
